name: R-COIL
description: "It's the "Dark Souls" of space shooters-- at least for me." -mightycow88. R-COIL is a multidirectional shooter with a unique single button control scheme. Use the stick to aim and a single button to fire and thrust. Tap to fire. Hold to thrust. Each time you fire your bullet will push you back a little.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and Up Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.66Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Graphics Memory and Directx 9.0c Compatible gpu DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard sound card Additional Notes: Gamepad or Mouse Required
